source_text: The Assembly of the High Altar
Builds an altar out of the components inside of the connected inventory.
target_text: 接続されたインベントリ内のコンポーネントから祭壇を構築します。

source_text: (Chest) Chest for breeding items if properly augmented.
target_text: (チェスト) 適切に拡張された場合、繁殖アイテム用のチェスト。

source_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.
target_text: (生) オーラの総生意志量に基づいて儀式の速度を増加させます。

source_text: (Destructive) Causes adults that have not bred lately to run at mobs and explode.
target_text: (破壊) 最近繁殖していない大人がモブに突進して爆発するようにします。

source_text: (Growth) Animals within this range will grow much faster.
target_text: (成長) この範囲内の動物がはるかに速く成長します。

source_text: Increases the maturity rate of baby animals within its range.
target_text: その範囲内のベビー動物の成熟速度を上げます。

source_text: (Steadfast) Automatically breeds adults within its area using items in the connected chest.
target_text: (堅牢) 接続されたチェスト内のアイテムを使用して、その地域内の大人を自動的に繁殖させます。

source_text: (Vengeful) Decreases the time it takes for adults to breed again.
target_text: (復讐) 大人が再び繁殖するまでの時間を減らします。

source_text: Increases the amount of maximum Upgrade Points on your Living Armor to 300.
target_text: 生きた鎧の最大アップグレードポイント数を300に増加させます。

source_text: First block for new range stored.
target_text: 新しい範囲の最初のブロックが保存されました。

source_text: The ritual stone is currently inactive, and cannot have its range modified.
target_text: 儀式の石は現在非アクティブで、その範囲を変更することはできません。

source_text: The range was not properly chosen.
target_text: 範囲が正しく選択されませんでした。
新しい範囲が正常に設定されました！

source_text: The block range given is too big! Needs to be at most %s blocks.
target_text: 与えられたブロック範囲が大きすぎます！最大で%sブロックである必要があります。

source_text: The block range given is too far! Needs to be within a vertical range of %s blocks and a horizontal range of %s blocks.
target_text: 与えられたブロック範囲が遠すぎます！垂直範囲内で%sブロック、水平範囲内で%sブロックである必要があります。

source_text: Players within this range will receive a Flight buff.
target_text: この範囲内のプレイヤーは飛行バフを受け取ります。

source_text: Provides flight in an area around the ritual.
target_text: Provides flight in an area around the 儀式.

source_text: (Containment) The area of the ritual where mobs will be pulled. All mobs are pulled towards the master ritual stone, regardless of where this area is.
target_text: (Containment) The area of the 儀式 where mobs will be pulled. All mobs are pulled towards the master 儀式 stone, regardless of where this area is.

source_text: Pulls all mobs within its area towards the master ritual stone.
target_text: Pulls all mobs within its area towards the master 儀式 stone.
リズム of the 打ち鳴らされる金床

source_text: (Corrosive) Ritual will instead craft using the linked Alchemy Table.
target_text: (Corrosive) 儀式 will instead craft using the linked Alchemy Table.

source_text: (Steadfast/Corrosive) Inserts and extracts items from the connected Hellfire Forge or Alchemy Table.
target_text: (堅牢/腐食) Inserts and extracts items from the connected ヘルファイア フォージ or Alchemy テーブル.

source_text: Crafts items based on the linked Item Filter using the connected Input inventory.
target_text: Crafts items based on the linked Item フィルター using the connected Input inventory.

source_text: (Chest) Input: Items for crafting are taken from this inventory.
target_text: (チェスト) Input: Items for crafting are taken from this inventory.

source_text: (Item Frame/Chest) Output Filter: If present, selects from possible outputs based on filter, and crafts until the selected amount is in output inventory.
target_text: (Item Frame/チェスト) Output フィルター: If present, selects from possible outputs based on filter, and crafts until the selected amount is in output inventory.

source_text: (Chest) Output: crafted items are inserted into the selected inventory, or spawned in the world if missing.
target_text: (チェスト) Output: crafted items are inserted into the selected inventory, or spawned in the world if missing.

source_text: (Item Frame/Chest) Input Filter: uses Item Filter to determine shape of recipe and selected items.
target_text: (Item Frame/チェスト) Input フィルター: uses Item フィルター to determine shape of recipe and selected items.

source_text: (Steadfast) Ritual will instead craft using the linked Hellfire Forge.
target_text: (Steadfast) 儀式 will instead craft using the linked Hellfire Forge.

source_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will place the broken blocks into.
target_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the 儀式 will place the broken blocks into.

source_text: (Corrosive) All blocks are broken to be processed with a form of Cutting Fluid. Overrides Silk Touch where applicable.
target_text: (腐食) All blocks are broken to be processed with a form of Cutting Fluid. Overrides Silk Touch where applicable.

source_text: (Crushing) The blocks that the ritual will break.
target_text: (Crushing) The blocks that the 儀式 will break.

source_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.
target_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of the 儀式 based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.

source_text: (Destructive) Blocks are broken down forcefully: all blocks broken are affected by Fortune III.
target_text: (破壊) Blocks are broken down forcefully: all blocks broken are affected by Fortune III.

source_text: Breaks blocks within its crushing range and places the items into the linked chest.
target_text: ブロックを破壊 内 its crushing range and places the アイテム into the リンクed chest.

source_text: (Steadfast) Causes all blocks that are broken to be picked up with Silk Touch. Overrides Fortune where applicable.
target_text: (堅牢) Causes all blocks that are broken to be picked up with Silk Touch. Overrides Fortune where applicable.

source_text: (Vengeful) Compresses the inventory on successful operation. Currently only does one compression per operation.
target_text: (復讐) Compresses the inventory on successful operation. 現在 only does one compression per operation.
Crack of the Fractured クリスタル

source_text: (Crystal) All Demon Will crystal clusters have a single crystal broken off, spawning the crystal into the world. If there is only one crystal on the cluster, it will not break it.
target_text: (クリスタル) All 悪魔 Will crystal clusters have a single crystal broken off, spawning the crystal into the world. If there is only one crystal on the cluster, it will not break it.

source_text: Breaks Demon Will Crystal Clusters of all aspects within its range, dropping the results on top of the crystals.
target_text: Breaks 悪魔 Will クリスタル Clusters of all aspects within its range, dropping the results on top of the crystals.
Resonance of the Faceted クリスタル

source_text: Splits apart a well-grown Raw crystal cluster into separately aspected crystal clusters.
target_text: 分割 a よく育った 生 クリスタル cluster into 別々に アスペクト crystal clusters.
懺悔 of the 重い ソウル

source_text: Consumes items from a linked chest to forcefully downgrade worn Living Armour.
target_text: アイテムを消費 from a リンクed chest to forcefully ダウングレード worn 生きた鎧.

source_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will grab blocks from to place in the world.
target_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the 儀式 will grab blocks from to place in the world.

source_text: Creates a hollow spheroid around the ritual using the blocks in the attached chest.
target_text: Creates a hollow spheroid around the 儀式 using the blocks in the attached chest.

source_text: (Placement) The range that the ritual will place its blocks in. Note that the Spheroid is centered on the ritual - if one side is shorter than the side opposite, the spheroid will be truncated.
target_text: (Placement) The range that the 儀式 will place its blocks in. Note that the Spheroid is centered on the 儀式 - if one side is shorter than the side opposite, the spheroid will be truncated.

source_text: Capable of transferring Life Essence from a Network back into an Altar at a cost.
target_text: Capable of transferring Life Essence from a ネットワーク back into an Altar at a cost.

source_text: (Expulsion) The area from which players that are not owner or have an orb in the chest will be teleported away from.
target_text: (排出) The area from which players that are not owner or have an orb in the chest will be teleported away from.

source_text: Expels players from its range that are neither the owner nor have a bound blood orb in the chest on top of the master ritual stone.
target_text: Expels players from its range that are neither the owner nor have a bound blood orb in the chest on top of the master 儀式 stone.
儀式 of the Feathered Knife

source_text: (Altar) This range defines the area that the ritual searches for the Blood Altar. Changing this will either expand or limit the range to a certain region.
target_text: (Altar) This range defines the area that the 儀式 searches for the Blood Altar. Changing this will either expand or limit the range to a certain region.

source_text: (Corrosive) Uses the player's current Incense Bonus (if any) to increase the yield. Stand near an Incense Altar to maintain this bonus.
target_text: (腐食) 使用 the player's current Incense Bonus (if any) to increase the yield. Stand near an Incense Altar to maintain this bonus.

source_text: (Damage) This defines where the ritual will damage a player. Players inside of this range will receive damage over time up to the specified limit.
target_text: (ダメージ) This defines where the 儀式 will damage a player. Players inside of this range will receive damage over time up to the specified limit.

source_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.
target_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of the 儀式 based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.

source_text: (Destructive) Increases the yield of the ritual based on the total amount of Destructive Will in the Aura.
target_text: (Destructive) Increases the yield of the 儀式 based on the total amount of Destructive Will in the Aura.

source_text: Drains health from players in its area and puts the LP into a nearby blood altar. LP Gains are affected by Runes of Self Sacrifice and Tough Palms.
target_text: 健康をドレイン from プレイヤー in its 範囲 and 置くs the LP into a nearby blood 祭壇. LP Gains are affected by ルーン of 自己 sacrifice and タフ パーム.

source_text: (Steadfast) Sets the minimum health for sacrificing from 30%% to 70%%.
target_text: (Steadfast) Sets the 最小健康 for sacrifice from 30%% to 70%%.

source_text: (Vengeful) Sets the minimum health for sacrificing to 10%%. Overridden by Steadfast for the Owner if active.
target_text: (Vengeful) Sets the 最小健康 for sacrifice to 10%%. オーバーライド by Steadfast for the 所有者 if アクティブ.
クラッシュ of The Timberman

source_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will place the results into.
target_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the 儀式 will place the results into.

source_text: (Cutting) The range that the ritual will search out logs and leaves in order to cut down.
target_text: (Cutting) The range that the 儀式 will search out logs and leaves in order to cut down.

source_text: A standard tree-cutting machine, this ritual will cut down all trees and leaves within its area and collect the drops.
target_text: A standard tree-cutting machine, this 儀式 will cut down all trees and leaves within its area and collect the drops.
集い of the 見捨てられた ソウルs
(チェスト) チェスト for catalyst items.

source_text: (Crystal) Will Crystals in this range have catalysts applied to them to increase growth speed.
target_text: (Crystal) Will Crystals in this range have 触媒 適用 to them to 増加 成長 speed.

source_text: Applies Will catalysts to crystals within range from the attached inventory.
target_text: Will を適用 触媒 to クリスタル 内 range from the 接続されたインベントリ.
儀式 of the Satiated Stomach

source_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will grab food from to feed players in range.
target_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the 儀式 will grab food from to feed players in range.

source_text: (Feeding) The range that the ritual will look at to feed players.
target_text: (Feeding) The range that the 儀式 will look at to feed players.

source_text: Takes food from the linked chest and fills the player's saturation with it.
target_text: 食べ物を取る from the リンクed chest and を満たす player's 満腹度 with it.
儀式 of the Green Grove

source_text: (Corrosive) Entities within range are attacked by nearby plants, leeching away their life to feed their own growth.
target_text: (Corrosive) エンティティーズ within range are attacked by nearby plants, leeching away their life to feed their own growth.

source_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of all ritual operations based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.
target_text: (Raw) Increases the speed of all 儀式 operations based on the total amount of Raw Will in the Aura.

source_text: (Destructive) Increases the maximum growth range of the ritual based on the total amount of Destructive Will in the Aura.
target_text: (Destructive) Increases the maximum growth range of the 儀式 based on the total amount of Destructive Will in the Aura.

source_text: (Growth) The area that the ritual will grow plants in.
target_text: (Growth) The area that the 儀式 will grow plants in.

source_text: (Steadfast) Blocks within this range are rehydrated into farmland, and seeds within the area are planted nearby.
target_text: (堅牢) Blocks within this range are rehydrated into farmland, and seeds within the area are planted nearby.
作物を育てる 内 its 範囲.

source_text: (Corrosive) Entities in this area have their life drained to grow nearby crops.
target_text: (Corrosive) エンティティーズ in this area have their life drained to grow nearby crops.

source_text: (Steadfast) Seeds are replanted and blocks are hydrated within the Hydration range.
target_text: (堅牢) Seeds are replanted and blocks are hydrated within the Hydration range.

source_text: (Vengeful) Increases the rate that a growth tick is successful.
target_text: (復讐) 増加 the rate that a growth tick is successful.
(生) 影響 プレイヤー.
(Range) 影響 エンティティ 内 range.
増加 gravity and prevents jumping.

source_text: (Steadfast) Affects Bosses. Doesn't affect bosses that are immune against motion change or immune against potions (except Wither and Ender Dragon).
target_text: (Steadfast) Affects Bosses. Doesn't affect bosses that are immune against motion change or immune against potions (except Wither and エンドer Dragon).
刈り取り of the 収穫 ムーン

source_text: (Harvesting) Plants within this range will be harvested.
target_text: (収穫ing) Plants within this range will be harvested.

source_text: Harvests plants within its range, dropping the results on the ground.
target_text: 収穫s plants within its range, dropping the results on the ground.

source_text: Pushes all mobs within its area away from the master ritual stone.
target_text: Pushes all mobs within its area away from the master 儀式 stone.

source_text: (Push) The area of the ritual where mobs will be pushed. All mobs are pushed away from the master ritual stone, regardless of where this area is.
target_text: (Push) The area of the 儀式 where mobs will be pushed. All mobs are pushed away from the master 儀式 stone, regardless of where this area is.
儀式 of the High Jump

source_text: Causes entities to leap up into the air.
target_text: エンティティを引き起こす to リープ up into the air.

source_text: (Power) Overall height of descriptor controls jump height and cost.
target_text: (パワー) ディスクリプターの全高さがジャンプの高さとコストを制御します。

source_text: (Jumping) Entities in this range will be launched in the air.
target_text: (Jumping) エンティティーズ in this range will be launched in the air.
セレナード of the ネザー

source_text: (Corrosive) Entities within range that are immune to fire are damaged severely.
target_text: (Corrosive) エンティティーズ within range that are immune to fire are damaged severely.

source_text: (Raw) Decreases the LP cost of placing lava and allows the lava to be directly placed into a tank or other fluid-handling block.
target_text: (生) LP を減らす cost of 溶岩を配置 and allows the lava to be 直接配置 into a タンク or other フルイド処理 ブロック.

source_text: (Destructive) Lava placement range is increased based on the total amount of Destructive Will in the Aura.
target_text: (破壊) Lava placement range is increased based on the total amount of 破壊 Will in the Aura.

source_text: (Corrosive) Entities within this range that are immune to fire damage are hurt proportionally to the amount of Corrosive Will in the Aura.
target_text: (Corrosive) エンティティーズ within this range that are immune to fire damage are hurt proportionally to the amount of Corrosive Will in the Aura.

source_text: (Vengeful) Entities in this range are afflicted by Fire Fuse.
target_text: (Vengeful) エンティティーズ in this range are afflicted by Fire Fuse.

source_text: (Steadfast) Players within this range have Fire Resistance applied to them.
target_text: (堅牢) Players within this range have Fire Resistance applied to them.

source_text: Generates a source of lava from the master ritual stone.
target_text: Generates a source of lava from the master 儀式 stone.

source_text: (Lava) The area within which the Ritual will place Lava Source Blocks.
target_text: (Lava) The area within which the 儀式 will place Lava Source Blocks.

source_text: (Raw) The tank that the ritual will place lava into.
target_text: (Raw) The tank that the 儀式 will place lava into.

source_text: (Steadfast) Players within this range have Fire Resistance applied to them.
target_text: (堅牢) Players within this range have Fire Resistance applied to them.

source_text: (Vengeful) Entities within range have Fire Fuse applied to them.
target_text: (Vengeful) エンティティーズ within range have Fire Fuse applied to them.

source_text: Pulls up ores from the ground and puts them into its placement range.
target_text: プルアップ 鉱石 from the 地面 and 置くs them into its 配置 range.

source_text: (Placement) The area that the ritual will place the grabbed ores into.
target_text: (Placement) The area that the 儀式 will place the grabbed ores into.
マーク of the 落下 塔

source_text: Consumes an item inside of its item range to summon a meteor full of resources from the sky, aimed directly at the ritual.
target_text: Consumes an item inside of its item range to summon a meteor full of resources from the sky, aimed directly at the 儀式.
ドメイン of The 埋め立て

source_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will grab blocks from to place in the world.
target_text: (Chest) The location of the inventory that the 儀式 will grab blocks from to place in the world.

source_text: Grabs blocks that are inside of the connected inventory and places them into the world.
target_text: ブロックをつかむ that are 内部 of the 接続されたインベントリ and それを配置 into the 世界.

source_text: (Placement) The range that the ritual will place its blocks in.
target_text: (Placement) The range that the 儀式 will place its blocks in.
The ゲート of the 折り目

source_text: Creates a portal network based on the activator and the immediately surrounding blocks. Blocks can be changed after activation without changing the network of portals, and portals with the same "key" will link together.
target_text: Creates a ポータルネットワーク based on the アクティベーター and the immediately 周囲 ブロックs. Blocks can be 変更 after アクティベーション without changing the network of portals, and portals with the same "key" will リンク together.
讃歌 of 吸い上げ

source_text: Looks around the world and grabs fluids from the defined area. Will only remove and put the fluid into the connected tank if the tank has at least a bucket's worth of the same fluid.
target_text: 周りを見る the 世界 and つかむ フルーイッド from the 定義 範囲. Will only 削除 and 置く the fluid into the connected タンク if the タンク has at least a バケツ's worth of the same fluid.

source_text: (Pump) The region that the ritual will look for fluids to grab from the world.
target_text: (Pump) The region that the 儀式 will look for fluids to grab from the world.

source_text: (Corrosive) Steals health from non-players inside of its Vampirism range and directly heals players.
target_text: (腐食) Steals health from non-players inside of its ヴァンパイアリズム range and directly heals players.

source_text: (Healing) Entities within this range will receive a regeneration buff.
target_text: (Healing) エンティティーズ within this range will receive a regeneration buff.

source_text: Casts regeneration on entities within its range if they are missing health.
target_text: キャスト 再生 on エンティティ 内 its range if they are 不足 health.

source_text: (Vampirism) Mobs within this range have their health syphoned to heal players in the Healing range.
target_text: (ヴァンパイアリズム) Mobs within this range have their health syphoned to heal players in the Healing range.
エッジ of the 隠れた レルム

source_text: Summons an Inversion Pillar, a tenuous gateway to the Demon Realm.
target_text: Summons an 反転 ピラー, a tenuous gateway to the 悪魔 レルム.

source_text: (Corrosive) Further increases horizontal velocity based on total Will.

source_text: (Destructive) Prevents child mobs and players from being transported. Players are transported if paired with Vengeful.
target_text: (破壊) Prevents child mobs and players from being transported. Players are transported if paired with 復讐.

source_text: Launches players within its range in the direction of the ritual.

target_text: (Speed) All entities within this area are launched in the direction of the arrow formed by the 儀式.

source_text: (Steadfast) Applies Soft Fall to mobs and players when transported, preventing fall damage.

source_text: (Vengeful) Prevents adult mobs and players from being transported. Players are transported if paired with Destructive.
target_text: (復讐) Prevents adult mobs and players from being transported. Players are transported if paired with 破壊.
